name: Hotel Californalien
description:
Hotel Californalien is a party game for players, on android device. You need to be on the same network to play. You have to share informations with your friends, in order to catch aliens. It's kind of a mix between Space team and Where's Wally ?

The team :

Alexandre Dewagnier – Marion Bossée – Thomas De Mot – Loriane Savona – Antoine Tirmarche – Meghan Martin – Amélie Perret (Dianouille)
